holidays.title: Congenital Heart Defect Awareness Day
holidays.description: Explore the prevalence of congenital heart defects in the world and how you can help.

holidays.title: Frederick Douglass Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the legacy of Frederick Douglass by emulating his example and challenging the inequalities of today.

holidays.title: Global Movie Day
holidays.description: Grab your popcorn and get ready to celebrate your favorite movies all day!

holidays.title: Gold Heart Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness and funds for the disabled and disadvantaged, so they can have equal opportunities.

holidays.title: Have a Heart Day
holidays.description: On Have a Heart Day, be the change you wish to see in the world.

holidays.title: International Book Giving Day
holidays.description: Share the gift of knowledge by donating a book to someone in need.

holidays.title: League of Women Voters Day
holidays.description: Join us and celebrate the league of women who expanded voting rights in the U.S.

holidays.title: Library Lovers’ Day
holidays.description: Digest this fact — there was a time when libraries didn’t exist!

holidays.title: Lui-Ngai-Ni Festival
holidays.description: A new year of prosperity is upon us; the Naga tribe comes together to celebrate Lui-Ngai-Ni.

holidays.title: Madly In Love With Me Day
holidays.description: Remember that you are amazing! On Madly in Love with Me Day, commit to loving yourself.

holidays.title: National Black Literacy Day
holidays.description: This day focuses on literacy and the importance of reading and writing in learning.

holidays.title: National Call in Single Day
holidays.description: Don't feel sad about being single. Instead, enjoy this day to the fullest.

holidays.title: National Chance Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor one of the most unique names in the world.

holidays.title: National Condom Day
holidays.description: National Condom Day promotes the necessary conversations about the proper usage of condoms.

holidays.title: National Cream-Filled Chocolate Day
holidays.description: Chocoholics will love this holiday that celebrates the decadent sweetness of cream-filled chocolates.

holidays.title: National Donor Day
holidays.description: By donating organs, you create a legacy of your generosity with the ultimate gift of love.

holidays.title: National Ferris Wheel Day
holidays.description: Let’s go on a Ferris wheel ride and enjoy the breathtaking view of the city.

holidays.title: National Football Hangover Day
holidays.description: Take this day to recover from all the football celebrations and excitement.

holidays.title: National Impotence Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn all about erectile dysfunction and its potential causes.

holidays.title: Organ Donor Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates and remembers people who have donated organs to save lives.

holidays.title: Pet Theft Awareness Day
holidays.description: If you don’t want your pet to land on a lost animal poster, raise your voice.

holidays.title: Quirkyalone Day
holidays.description: Quirkyalone Day is dedicated to the most important kind of love — self-love.

holidays.title: Rafik Hariri Memorial Day
holidays.description: The assassination of Rafik Hariri was a turning point in the history of Lebanon.

holidays.title: Read to Your Child Day
holidays.description: Get out your favorite books, gather your kids, and celebrate Read to Your Child Day.

holidays.title: Scout Sabbath
holidays.description: Put on your uniform and get ready to honor Shabbat with all the information we have!

holidays.title: Statehood Day in Arizona
holidays.description: Statehood Day in Arizona also celebrates the rich culture and history of Arizona.

holidays.title: World Bonobo Day
holidays.description: Today, we educate and raise awareness about bonobos, a species on the verge of extinction.

holidays.title: World Sound Healing Day
holidays.description: Join millions of people around the world in celebrating World Sound Healing Day.

holidays.title: Companiondish’s Birthday
holidays.description: An online career is only one of the games that this amazing player is winning!

holidays.title: Karol G’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer and composer has taken the world of Latin music by storm.

holidays.title: Koharu Sugawara’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a very talented choreographer and model who has danced her way into success.

holidays.title: Tati Westbrook’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world of makeup tutorials owes a lot to this iconic YouTuber and businesswoman.
